beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, pine sap, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable. Our precious Pale Ale.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable. Our precious Pale Ale.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, pine sap, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #15. Brewed with rye, oats and wheat. Hopped with Cascade. Fermented in our large French oak foudres. Traditional, complex, and zippy.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #15. Brewed with rye, oats and wheat. Hopped with Cascade. Fermented in our large French oak foudres. Traditional, complex, and zippy.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth

beers.notes: Notes of dignified tropical musk, citrus pith, drippy guava, and crushed fir needles
beers.description: Righteous Double IPA 8.0% NO IDEA IS ORIGINAL. Brewed with malted spelt and a touch of caramel malt. LIFE IS A MIRROR OF CONFUSION. Hopped in the kettle with Citra and Simcoe. NEGATIVITY IS A PRISON. Dry hopped aggressively with Simcoe, Mosaic, and Centennial.  TAKE THE HIGH ROAD.
beers.summary:
Righteous Double IPA 8.0% NO IDEA IS ORIGINAL. Brewed with malted spelt and a touch of caramel malt. LIFE IS A MIRROR OF CONFUSION. Hopped in the kettle with Citra and Simcoe. NEGATIVITY IS A PRISON. Dry hopped aggressively with Simcoe, Mosaic, and Centennial.  TAKE THE HIGH ROAD.
Notes of dignified tropical musk, citrus pith, drippy guava, and crushed fir needles

beers.notes: Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.
beers.description: Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts.  Hopped gently with Chinook.  Austere, but inviting.
beers.summary:
Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts.  Hopped gently with Chinook.  Austere, but inviting.
Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.

beers.notes: Notes of white grape, hay, clover honey, white peach, and fresh cut grass.
beers.description: Helles Lager 5.3% Brewed with 100% German Pilsner malt and hopped lightly with Hallertau Blanc.  Fermented with our house lager yeast and cold conditioned for four weeks before its release. Refined and eminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Helles Lager 5.3% Brewed with 100% German Pilsner malt and hopped lightly with Hallertau Blanc.  Fermented with our house lager yeast and cold conditioned for four weeks before its release. Refined and eminently crushable.
Notes of white grape, hay, clover honey, white peach, and fresh cut grass.

beers.notes: Notes of green strawberry, lemon-lime, champagne mango, watermelon rind, and mandarin zest.
beers.description: Crushable IPA 4.5% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw & malted wheat, and malted oats.  Acidified in the kettle with a bit of lemon juice.  Fermented with a new blend of yeasts, including our favorite Kolsch strain.  We dry hopped this batch with a whole lot of Simcoe and Citra.  A hopeful reach for warmer months.
beers.summary:
Crushable IPA 4.5% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw & malted wheat, and malted oats.  Acidified in the kettle with a bit of lemon juice.  Fermented with a new blend of yeasts, including our favorite Kolsch strain.  We dry hopped this batch with a whole lot of Simcoe and Citra.  A hopeful reach for warmer months.
Notes of green strawberry, lemon-lime, champagne mango, watermelon rind, and mandarin zest.

beers.notes: Notes of white pepper, unripe peach, mineral water, hay and citrus flower.
beers.description: Table Saison 3.3%  Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat, and hopped with ample amounts of German grown Saaz and Mandarina Bavaria.  Primary fermented in one of our large oak foudres with our Magickal saison yeast.  Raw, simple, and made for drinking.
beers.summary:
Table Saison 3.3%  Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat, and hopped with ample amounts of German grown Saaz and Mandarina Bavaria.  Primary fermented in one of our large oak foudres with our Magickal saison yeast.  Raw, simple, and made for drinking.
Notes of white pepper, unripe peach, mineral water, hay and citrus flower.

beers.notes: Notes of floral apricot, Valencia orange, cooked peach, sweet lime, and unripe mango.
beers.description: IPA 6.3% An adaptation of an old BrewCafe favorite from the early days of the reign of Mosaic.  Brewed with malted wheat and dry hopped aggressively with Mosaic, Motueka, and Simcoe.
beers.summary:
IPA 6.3% An adaptation of an old BrewCafe favorite from the early days of the reign of Mosaic.  Brewed with malted wheat and dry hopped aggressively with Mosaic, Motueka, and Simcoe.
Notes of floral apricot, Valencia orange, cooked peach, sweet lime, and unripe mango.

beers.notes: Notes of herbal meyer lemon, fresh cut grass, crisp grain, mineral water, and white grape.
beers.description: Oak Fermented Wheat Lager 4.3% Brewed with German Pilsner malt and a blend of raw & malted wheat.  Fermented cool with our house lager yeast in one of our large oak foudres at the Dispensary, then cold conditioned in oak on just a touch of lemon juice for many moons.
beers.summary:
Oak Fermented Wheat Lager 4.3% Brewed with German Pilsner malt and a blend of raw & malted wheat.  Fermented cool with our house lager yeast in one of our large oak foudres at the Dispensary, then cold conditioned in oak on just a touch of lemon juice for many moons.
Notes of herbal meyer lemon, fresh cut grass, crisp grain, mineral water, and white grape.

beers.notes: Notes of brisk white grape, lemon zest, plum skin, honeycrisp apple, and flinty minerality.
beers.description: Riesling Saison 8.6% Brewed to a four grain base similar to our SaisonHands, primary fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Blended and secondary fermented to complete dryness with domestic Riesling juice.
beers.summary:
Riesling Saison 8.6% Brewed to a four grain base similar to our SaisonHands, primary fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Blended and secondary fermented to complete dryness with domestic Riesling juice.
Notes of brisk white grape, lemon zest, plum skin, honeycrisp apple, and flinty minerality.

beers.notes: Notes of meyer lemon, fragrant hard spice, puckering tamarind, and creamy meringue.
beers.description: Strange Spiced Double Dry Hopped Extra Blonde Ale 7.2% Brewed with a touch of Vienna malt and hopped in the kettle with Motueka and Centennial.  Spiced with tamarind powder and a dash of turmeric to the kettle.  Conditioned on heaps of lemon & tamarind puree, and Tahitian vanilla, and dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra, Crystal, & Cascade.
beers.summary:
Strange Spiced Double Dry Hopped Extra Blonde Ale 7.2% Brewed with a touch of Vienna malt and hopped in the kettle with Motueka and Centennial.  Spiced with tamarind powder and a dash of turmeric to the kettle.  Conditioned on heaps of lemon & tamarind puree, and Tahitian vanilla, and dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra, Crystal, & Cascade.
Notes of meyer lemon, fragrant hard spice, puckering tamarind, and creamy meringue.

beers.notes: Notes of mango jam, spruce tips, ruby red grapefruit, bubblegum, and candied pineapple.
beers.beer: We Are All Infinite Energy Vibrating at the Same Frequency
beers.description: Wheat IPA. 6.5% An original BrewCafe classic returns! Brewed with malted wheat and hopped intensely with Centennial and Simcoe. Vibrant and drippy juicy!
beers.summary:
Wheat IPA. 6.5% An original BrewCafe classic returns! Brewed with malted wheat and hopped intensely with Centennial and Simcoe. Vibrant and drippy juicy!
Notes of mango jam, spruce tips, ruby red grapefruit, bubblegum, and candied pineapple.

beers.description: Blackcurrant Mild 3.0% Inspired by British dark mild. Brewed with British malted barley and oats, and a plethora of specialty malts. Hopped lightly with German Callista, and boiled and conditioned with blackcurrants.
beers.summary: Blackcurrant Mild 3.0% Inspired by British dark mild. Brewed with British malted barley and oats, and a plethora of specialty malts. Hopped lightly with German Callista, and boiled and conditioned with blackcurrants.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #16. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #16. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of grapefruit pith,honeydew melon, moist garden soil, and dandelion greens.
beers.description: Farmhouse IPA. 6.0% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya. It was brewed entirely with French pilsner malt. Solely and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Brewers Gold. Fermented with a new magikal mixed culture in stainless. Then gently dry hopped with Brewers Gold, Lemondrop and French Strisselspalt.
beers.summary:
Farmhouse IPA. 6.0% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya. It was brewed entirely with French pilsner malt. Solely and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Brewers Gold. Fermented with a new magikal mixed culture in stainless. Then gently dry hopped with Brewers Gold, Lemondrop and French Strisselspalt.
Notes of grapefruit pith,honeydew melon, moist garden soil, and dandelion greens.

beers.notes: Notes of dark chocolate, cinnabons, sweet biscuits, and cozy log cabin breakfasts.
beers.description: French Toast Dark Mild. 4.3% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Hopped with a dash of Loral in the kettle along with a healthy dash of cinnamon. Then Conditioned in stainless on Madagascar Vanilla Beans and PA Maple Syrup.
beers.summary:
French Toast Dark Mild. 4.3% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Hopped with a dash of Loral in the kettle along with a healthy dash of cinnamon. Then Conditioned in stainless on Madagascar Vanilla Beans and PA Maple Syrup.
Notes of dark chocolate, cinnabons, sweet biscuits, and cozy log cabin breakfasts.

beers.notes: Notes of chocolate covered spruce trees, coconut candies, and key lime sorbet.
beers.description: Coconut & Lime Black IPA. 7.0% Brewed with a plethora of dark malts. Heavily hopped in the kettle with Melba along with heaps of goopy coconut oil and lime juice. Then aggressively dry hopped with Motueka and Zythos.
beers.summary:
Coconut & Lime Black IPA. 7.0% Brewed with a plethora of dark malts. Heavily hopped in the kettle with Melba along with heaps of goopy coconut oil and lime juice. Then aggressively dry hopped with Motueka and Zythos.
Notes of chocolate covered spruce trees, coconut candies, and key lime sorbet.

beers.notes: Notes of dark wild berries, barnyard must, rose, and chalky bones.
beers.description: Pinot Noir Saison. 6.5% Brewed with Pilsner malt and spelt. Gently hopped in the kettle with Saaz. Fermented in stainless on freshly pressed Pinot Noir juice and strawberry puree. Conditioned for many moons in stainless.
beers.summary:
Pinot Noir Saison. 6.5% Brewed with Pilsner malt and spelt. Gently hopped in the kettle with Saaz. Fermented in stainless on freshly pressed Pinot Noir juice and strawberry puree. Conditioned for many moons in stainless.
Notes of dark wild berries, barnyard must, rose, and chalky bones.

beers.notes: Notes of black tea, lemon zest, tobacco leaf, and savory biscuits.
beers.description: Biere de Mars. 5.2% Brewed with Chateau Monastique and Pilsner malt. Hopped aggressively with French Strisselspalt. Fermented with our favorite lager yeast and our magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on smoked paprika.
beers.summary:
Biere de Mars. 5.2% Brewed with Chateau Monastique and Pilsner malt. Hopped aggressively with French Strisselspalt. Fermented with our favorite lager yeast and our magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on smoked paprika.
Notes of black tea, lemon zest, tobacco leaf, and savory biscuits.
